news.title: New Phishing Campaign Targeting Banking Customers
news.description: A sophisticated phishing campaign is targeting customers of major banks with fake security alerts. Users are advised to verify all communications directly with their bank.

news.title: QR Code Scams on the Rise
news.description: Scammers are placing malicious QR codes in public places to steal personal information. Always verify the URL before entering sensitive information.

news.title: Text Message Scams Impersonating Delivery Services
news.description: Fraudsters are sending fake delivery notification texts with malicious links. Never click on suspicious links claiming to be from delivery services.

news.title: Investment Scams Using Social Media
news.description: Scammers are using social media platforms to promote fake investment opportunities. Be wary of promises of high returns with little or no risk.

news.title: Romance Scams Costing Victims Millions
news.description: Online romance scams continue to be one of the most financially devastating scams, with victims losing millions annually to fraudsters posing as potential partners.

news.title: Government Impersonation Scams Increase
news.description: Scammers pretending to be from government agencies are contacting people demanding payments or personal information. Government agencies never call demanding immediate payment.

news.title: Fake Tech Support Calls Target Seniors
news.description: Scammers posing as tech support representatives are targeting seniors, claiming their computers are infected with viruses and demanding payment for services.

news.title: Cryptocurrency Scams Reach New Heights
news.description: Fraudulent cryptocurrency schemes have reached record levels, with scammers using everything from fake exchanges to Ponzi schemes to defraud investors.

news.title: Job Scams Targeting Remote Workers
news.description: Fake job listings for remote positions are being used to collect personal information or trick victims into money laundering schemes involving fraudulent checks.

news.title: AI-Generated Voice Scams Impersonating Family Members
news.description: A new wave of scams using AI to clone voices is targeting people with calls that sound like distressed family members in need of immediate financial help.
